articles.title: Info Edge crosses Rs 2,500 Cr revenue and Rs 500 Cr profit threshold in FY24 - Entrackr
articles.description: Info Edge’s revenue from operations grew 8% to Rs 2,536 crore in FY24 from Rs 2,345 crore in FY23
